commands.igtips.tip.unknown: L'astucia %s no existe. Asegúrese qu'está utilizando el nombre correcto y de que está cargado en el servidor.
tip.igtips.name: Astucia
config.igtips.main.title: In-Game Tips Options
config.igtips.client.title: Opciones del Cliente
config.igtips.client.option.tips_enabled: Activar o desactivar la distribución de las astucias. Se esta opción es desactivada, las astucias recebudas de servidor no estarán distribuidas, pero estarán siempre marcadas como vistas.
config.igtips.client.option.sound_enable: Activa o desactiva el son qu'esta juegado cando se recebe una nueva astucia.
config.igtips.client.option.max_lines.to: Sets the maximum number of lines that can be displayed in a tip. If a tip exceeds this limit, it will be truncated.
config.igtips.common.option.schedule_tim:
Sets the time in seconds between each tip. If the value is set to 0, the tips won't be sent automatically.

Example: 60 (1 minute), 90 (1 minute 30 seconds), 300 (5 minutes)
config.igtips.common.option.disabled_nam: Sets the namespaces will not be loaded on datapack loading/reloading. This option is useful for disabling tips from specific mods (modid) or packs (datapackid).
One or more namespaces are empty fields.
Use only lowercase letters, numbers, _, -, and .
config.igtips.common.option.tip_recyclin: Enables or disables the reuse of tips that have already been displayed. When this option is activated, viewed tips will be reset after the last tip has been displayed.
config.igtips.common.option.sync_sending: This option allows the server to send tips to all connected clients at the same time. If this option is deactivated, the server will send tips to each client individually with their own schedule time.
config.igtips.common.option.individual_t: Enables or disables the tips to be sent individually to each client. If this option is deactivated, the server will send the same tip to all connected clients at the same time.
